welcomesystem.set.autowelcome.enabled: Auto welcoming enabled. $1 will now welcome new chatters.
welcomesystem.set.message.empty: $1 will only welcome first time chatters.
welcomesystem.set.firstmessage.empty: $1 will welcome first time chatters with the default message.
welcomesystem.set.firstmessage.success: $1 will welcome first time chatters with "$2".
welcomesystem.set.cooldown.show: Current cooldown: $1 hours. Use: !welcome cooldown hours to change it.
welcomesystem.generalusage: Usage: !welcome [toggle | setmessage text | setfirstmessage text | disable user | enable user]. Tags for message text: (names), (1 text for one name), (2 for two), (3 for three or more names)
